full_summary:
# Tender Title:
### Technical Support for 2.15 Facilitation Services for Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC)

### Tender Reference Number: PW-23-01020716
### Solicitation Number: 5000071763

### Tender Status: Expired

## Brief Description

Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) requires professional services for 2.15 Facilitation Services, which includes conducting facilitation of engagement activities to support the delivery of Net-Zero Advisory Board’s mandate. This requirement is open to those Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under Tier 1 for category 2.15 Facilitation Services.

## Scope of Work:

- Two (2) Facilitator consultants are required to conduct facilitation activities as and when requested.
- Propose period of contract: The proposed period of contract shall be from contract award to March 31, 2024.
- Level of security requirement: No security required.

## Applicable Trade Agreements:

- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contact Information:

- Marie-Christine Blais, Procurement and Supply Specialist
marie-christine.blais@ec.gc.ca
105 McGill st, Montréal, QCH2Y 2E7

## Procurement Contact:

To find out how you can be a qualified SA Holder, please contact SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA.

# Attachment:

A document is available for downloading from the Canada Buy and Sell (Canadabuys) webpage, under the tender reference number PW-23-01020716.
